newsitem.title: USA: Porno For Pyros tour derailed by cancer.
newsitem.headline: Porno For Pyros tour derailed by cancer.

text.p: Popular rock group Porno For Pyros have scrapped their current tour to allow their guitarist to receive treatment for cancer, the band's label said on Wednesday.

Peter Distephano will undergo chemotherapy and doctors were optimistic he would recover fully, a statement from Warner Bros. Records said. It did not reveal what form of cancer he had, but noted it was diagnosed early.
"Peter remains in good spirits and is looking forward to resuming the band's touring schedule," the label said.
Porno For Pyros, led by Lollapalooza co-founder and former Jane's Addiction vocalist Perry Farrell, have been touring in support of their second album, "Good God's Urge."
The group has postponed eight concerts in the western U.S. as well as dates in Mexico City, Santiago, Buenos Aires, Rio De Janeiro and Sao Paulo.
